about.title: About
about.subtitle: Full Stack & DevOps Developer
about.description: Passionate about web development and new technologies, I create innovative and performant solutions.

items.title: Terminal Portfolio
items.description: An interactive portfolio inspired by Unix terminals, with custom commands and an immersive interface.
items.longDescription: This portfolio is an interactive web application that simulates the experience of a Unix terminal. It allows visitors to interact with content through custom commands, creating a unique and memorable experience. The project demonstrates my frontend development skills and innovative user interface creation.

items.title: E-commerce Platform
items.description: A complete e-commerce platform with stock management, payments, and analytics.
items.longDescription: A robust and scalable e-commerce platform that provides a seamless shopping experience for users while offering powerful tools for administrators. The system includes comprehensive stock management, secure payment processing, and detailed analytics of sales and user behavior.

items.title: AI Chat Assistant
items.description: An AI conversational assistant for customer support and task automation.
items.longDescription: A sophisticated AI assistant that uses natural language processing to understand and respond to user queries. The system can handle customer support requests, automate repetitive tasks, and provide relevant information in a conversational manner.

items.title: DevOps Dashboard
items.description: A dashboard to monitor and manage cloud infrastructure and deployments.
items.longDescription: A comprehensive DevOps dashboard that centralizes cloud infrastructure monitoring and management. It enables teams to track performance, manage deployments, and respond quickly to incidents while providing detailed insights into system status.
